data.name: Vanguard Princess Artwork and Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
This multimedia collection of art and music that is a must have for all Vanguard Princess fans! Listen to over 130 minutes of full-length music from all versions of Vanguard Princess. There's also a collection of hi-res artwork comprised of production work, and game stages. This is an ever expanding library for every new update or version of Vanguard Princess.

Track Listing



Vanguard Princess Soundtrack

01. You Can't Stop Me
02. Opening
03. Mode Select
04. Character Select
05. Tutorial
06. Roof Stage
07. Shrine Stage
08. Ruins Stage
09. School Stage
10. Pool Stage
11. Night Stage
12. Field Stage
13. Final Stage
14. Ending

Vanguard Hilda Rize Soundtrack

01. Moonlit Night Lullaby
02. Lucifer
03. Don't Ever Let Me Go
04. Lucifer (No Lyrics)

Vanguard Lilith Soundtrack

01. Opening (Lilith)
02. Mode Select (Lilith)
03. Mansion Stage
05. Grave Yard Stage
06. Treasures
07. Sisters

Vanguard Kurumi Soundtrack

01. Wanna Call You Daisy
02. Luxury Morning
03. One Of Love
04. Character Select (Kurumi)
05. Dojo Stage
06. Hangar Stage
07. Gym Stage
08. Candyland Stage
09. Ocean Stage
10. Conversation
11. Continue (Kurumi)
12. Weekend Jump
13. Crystal Of Vision
14. Yours Sincerely
15. Road Stage
16. Opening (Kurumi - Unreleased)
17. Mode Select (Unreleased)

Vanguard Deluxe Soundtrack

01. Desire
02. Opening (Deluxe)
03. Mode Select (Deluxe)
04. Character Select (Deluxe)
05. Wreck Stage (Deluxe)
06. Continue (Deluxe)
07. Distant Summer Day
08. Silly Bee

data.short_description: This multimedia collection of art and music that is a must have for all Vanguard Princess fans! Listen to over 130 minutes of full-length music from all versions of Vanguard Princess. There's also a collection of hi-res and visually striking artwork comprised of production work, and game stages.
